mdRecord.dcterms:description: This black and white photograph shows two men standing in front of Blandome. The handwritten notes on the back include an original inscription: "Cousin Alex and Rev. Downing." There are later notes. One adds the first name of Lylburn to Rev. Downing. The other later note reads, "Lylburn Downing School in Lexington, Named after Rev. Downing. Alexander Barbour Wood, son of Nannie and Clarence M. Wood, named after Cousin Alex.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Cousin Alex and Rev. Lylburn Downing (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
Portraits
Wood, Alexander Barbour
Downing, Lylburn
